alfredsnippet.snippet:
# create a clip from the video starting at "00:02:00" and ending at "00:39:37", and save it as "_clip.mp4".
start_time="00:02:00"
end_time="00:39:10"
video="{clipboard}"
# remove '.mp4' from the end of the video name
video_name="${video%.mp4}"
output_clip="${video_name}_clip.mp4"

ffmpeg -ss $start_time -to $end_time -i "$video" -c copy "$output_clip"
alfredsnippet.name: Video Cut- trim mp4 264 Extract clip by start & end
